title: Fifteenth Olympic Games - Helsinki: Men's diving
brief_description: Made with the official sanction of FINA, this film records the following diving events at the Helsinki Olympic Games: -Workouts on tower and springboard; final three-meter springboard- men; final platform- men; final platform diving- women.
